title: (x) 50's Robot toy packaging - custom drawn, Helvetica, Brush Script {Tim D}
content:
Hi

Could anyone id the typefaces used on this packaging for a robot? (“battery operated” “robot” and “shoot him”

Thanks!

| --- | --- |
| [robot.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123023552/http:/typophile.com/files/robot_0.jpg) | 57.57 KB |

author: Marstrois

comments.content:
Try one of the versions of Brush Script for Shoot Him…  
Battery operated looks like Helvetica, I bet Robot has hand drawn Os they look out of step with the rest of the letterforms.  
Tim
